1SA.name: 1 Samuel
1SA.notes: 1 Kings or Kingdoms in Orthodox Bibles; |br| do not confuse this abbreviation with |br| ISA for Isaiah

2SA.name: 2 Samuel
2SA.notes: 2 Kings or Kingdoms in Orthodox Bibles

1KI.name: 1 Kings
1KI.notes: 3 Kings or Kingdoms in Orthodox Bibles

2KI.name: 2 Kings
2KI.notes: 4 Kings or Kingdoms in Orthodox Bibles

NEH.name: Nehemiah
NEH.notes: Sometimes appended to Ezra; called |br| 2 Esdras in the Vulgate

EST.name: Esther (Hebrew)
EST.notes: This is for Hebrew Esther; for the longer |br| Greek LXX Esther use ESG

ECC.name: Ecclesiastes
ECC.notes: Qoholeth in Catholic Bibles; for |br| Ecclesiasticus use SIR

ISA.name: Isaiah
ISA.notes: Do not confuse this abbreviation with 1SA |br| for 1 Samuel

JER.name: Jeremiah
JER.notes: The Book of Jeremiah; for the Letter of |br| Jeremiah use LJE

DAN.name: Daniel (Hebrew)
DAN.notes: This is for Hebrew Daniel; for the longer |br| Greek LXX Daniel use DAG

JON.name: Jonah
JON.notes: Do not confuse this abbreviation with JHN |br| for John

ROM.name: Romans
ROM.notes: The Letter of Paul to the Romans

1CO.name: 1 Corinthians
1CO.notes: The First Letter of Paul to the Corinthians

2CO.name: 2 Corinthians
2CO.notes: The Second Letter of Paul to the Corinthians

GAL.name: Galatians
GAL.notes: The Letter of Paul to the Galatians

EPH.name: Ephesians
EPH.notes: The Letter of Paul to the Ephesians

PHP.name: Philippians
PHP.notes: The Letter of Paul to the Philippians

COL.name: Colossians
COL.notes: The Letter of Paul to the Colossians

1TH.name: 1 Thessalonians
1TH.notes: The First Letter of Paul to the Thessalonians

2TH.name: 2 Thessalonians
2TH.notes: The Second Letter of Paul to the |br| Thessalonians

1TI.name: 1 Timothy
1TI.notes: The First Letter of Paul to Timothy

2TI.name: 2 Timothy
2TI.notes: The Second Letter of Paul to Timothy

TIT.name: Titus
TIT.notes: The Letter of Paul to Titus

PHM.name: Philemon
PHM.notes: The Letter of Paul to Philemon

JUD.name: Jude
JUD.notes: The Letter of Jude; do not confuse this |br|

REV.name: Revelation
REV.notes: The Revelation to John; called Apocalypse in |br|

SIR.name: Sirach
SIR.notes: Ecclesiasticus or Jesus son of Sirach

S3Y.name: Song of the 3 Young Men
S3Y.notes: Includes the Prayer of Azariah; sometimes |br|

BEL.name: Bel and the Dragon
BEL.notes: Sometimes included in Greek Daniel; called |br|

4MA.name: 4 Maccabees
4MA.notes: In an appendix to the Greek Bible and in the |br| Georgian Bible

1ES.name: 1 Esdras (Greek)
1ES.notes: The 9 chapter book of Greek Ezra in the LXX

2ES.name: 2 Esdras (Latin)
2ES.notes: The 16 chapter book of Latin Esdras called |br| '3 Esdras' in Russian Bibles and called |br| '4 Esdras' in the Vulgate; for the 12 chapter |br| Apocalypse of Ezra use EZA

PS2.name: Psalm 151
PS2.notes: An additional Psalm in the Septuagint

ODA.name: Odae/Odes
ODA.notes: A book in some editions of the Septuagint; |br| Odes has different contents in Greek

PSS.name: Psalms of Solomon
PSS.notes: A book in some editions of the Septuagint

EZA.name: Ezra Apocalypse
EZA.notes: 12 chapter book of Ezra Apocalypse; called |br| '3 Ezra' in the Armenian Bible

5EZ.name: 5 Ezra
5EZ.notes: 2 chapter Latin preface to Ezra Apocalypse; |br| formerly called 5ES

6EZ.name: 6 Ezra
6EZ.notes: 2 chapter Latin conclusion to Ezra |br| Apocalypse; formerly called 6ES

DAG.name: Daniel Greek
DAG.notes: The 14 chapter version of Daniel from the |br| Septuagint including Greek additions

PS3.name: Psalms 152-155
PS3.notes: Additional Psalms 152-155 found in West |br| Syriac manuscripts

2BA.name: 2 Baruch (Apocalypse)
2BA.notes: The Apocalypse of Baruch in Syriac Bibles

LBA.name: Letter of Baruch
LBA.notes: Sometimes appended to 2 Baruch; |br|  sometimes separate in Syriac Bibles

JUB.name: Jubilees
JUB.notes: Ancient Hebrew book used in the Ethiopian |br| Bible

ENO.name: Enoch
ENO.notes: Sometimes called '1 Enoch'; ancient Hebrew |br| book in the Ethiopian Bible

1MQ.name: 1 Meqabyan/Mekabis
1MQ.notes: Book of Mekabis of Benjamin in the |br| Ethiopian Bible

2MQ.name: 2 Meqabyan/Mekabis
2MQ.notes: Book of Mekabis of Moab in the Ethiopian |br| Bible

3MQ.name: 3 Meqabyan/Mekabis
3MQ.notes: Book of Meqabyan in the Ethiopian Bible

REP.name: Reproof
REP.notes: Proverbs part 2: Used in the Ethiopian Bible
